member.name: MFCLOCK_CHARACTERISTICS_FLAGS
member.summary: Contains flags that describe the characteristics of a clock. These flags are returned by the method.

member.name: MFCLOCK_CHARACTERISTICS_FLAGS.MFCLOCK_CHARACTERISTICS_FLAG_FREQUENCY_10MHZ
member.summary: The clock times returned by the method are in units of 100 nanoseconds. If this flag is absent, call to get the clock frequency. The clock frequency is given in the qwClockFrequency member of the structure returned by that method.

member.name: MFCLOCK_CHARACTERISTICS_FLAGS.MFCLOCK_CHARACTERISTICS_FLAG_ALWAYS_RUNNING
member.summary: The clock is always running. If this flag is present, the clock cannot be paused or stopped. If this flag is absent, call the method to get the current state.

member.name: MFCLOCK_CHARACTERISTICS_FLAGS.MFCLOCK_CHARACTERISTICS_FLAG_IS_SYSTEM_CLOCK
member.summary: The clock times are generated from the system clock.
